attributes.action: Provide full details on how psychiatry is funded by the taxpayer, in total each year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hospitals are laying off nurses and doctors because of cash shortages, and yet Psychiatry is apparantly fully funded at all levels.
The PM is requested to publish exactly how much is invested in psychiatric care in the UK, under the following headings:
- Hospitals
- Doctors
- Drugs
- Teaching
- Research

...so that everyone can see where the money is being used.

This should be in the form of an annual statement from the department of Health - currently it is impossible to wade through NHS reports to obtain this data, as a total.
